hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides the #Market Bazaar#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Green Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the path of #gold#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Hallway Left Invisible Chest

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Green Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Green Rupee# and #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that unfreezing #King Zora# grants #a Piece of the Triforce#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that past a #silver block in the Spirit Temple# boulders and a melody conceal...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #a Green Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Early Adult Right Chest

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Piece of the Triforce# and #a Red Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Light Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the final prize of #the thieves' training# is #a Piece of the Triforce#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Final Chest

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##Hyrule Castle## has #0# major items.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##Goron City## has #2# major items.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #a Green Rupee# can be found on #the Death Mountain Trail#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: Where did Anju meet her lover?^${12 39 C7}At a Kafei.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #the Fire Arrows#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Green Rupee#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Blue Fire Arrows# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.
hinted_locations: LH Underwater Near Shore Green Rupee

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Zora's Domain# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Green Rupee#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that Okami is the best Zelda game.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Climb North Chest

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides a #Slingshot Shooting Gallery#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Zora Tunic# and #a Purple Rupee#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that under the #entrance of the Fire Temple# a blocked path leads to...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Epona's Song#.
